title: Passionate Harvest
description: Nursery nurse Lucy Morgan, unexpectedly inherit half a Somerset vineyard with conditions and a co-owner attached.Unwilling co-owner Dominic LeFevre, doesn’t want or need a new business partner, especially one who knows nothing about wine.With Lucy having left behind her old life, and love in Tenerife, she has twelve months to convince Dominic that she’s exactly what both he, and the business, need.
author: Nell Dixon
